Journal reference:§1§nErgodic Theory and Dynamical Systems, Cambridge University Press
  (CUP), 2020§r

Version:§7v3 (Wed, 13 Jul 2022 09:12:14 GMT)§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7ov3: The published article (Ergodic Theory Dynam.Systems 40, 2020) contained a significant error in Lemma 2.14, used in the core Theorem 4.1. This is a consolidated version of the article, with the error corrected (and a

few other minor points improved along the way). In order to fix theerror, the assumption on coupling in 4.1 needsto be slightly modified (see also Definition 2.12) and Lemma 2.14 (now numbered 2.15) has been adjusted. Section 5.1

provides a criterion to ensure this new hypothesis in our cases of interest, so that all other results are unaffected. I apologize to readers of the previous versionfor this embarrassing mistake, and warmly thank Manuel Stadlbauer
for pointing out this error to me\u00a7r
